sentences.english: This eclipse falls on a fixed star Alhena, and that indicates some difficulty in travel.
sentences.chinese: 月食落入双子座意味着旅行中遭遇的困难。

sentences.english: Eclipses test the strength of our resolve and of our relationships.
sentences.chinese: 日月食会检验我们的决心和关系的牢固程度。

sentences.english: The costars start filming Eclipse, the third installment in the series, in August.
sentences.chinese: 他还说第三部《月食》将在八月开拍。

sentences.english: You drag the family out of bed at 2AM to watch a lunar eclipse.
sentences.chinese: 你会在凌晨2点把全家从被窝里拽出来看月食。

sentences.english: Two men sit on a bridge to watch an annular solar eclipse in Zhengzhou, Henan province, China
sentences.chinese: 中国河南省郑州市，两人人坐在桥上观看月食。

sentences.english: Unlike solar eclipses, lunar eclipsesare safe to watch with the naked eye.
sentences.chinese: 与日食不同，裸眼看月食是安全的。

sentences.english: There are various ways you may feel the effects of this eclipse of August 5.
sentences.chinese: 有许多种8月5日月食的影响你可以感受到。

sentences.english: Unlike solar eclipses, lunar eclipses are safe to watch with the naked eye.
sentences.chinese: 与日食不同，裸眼看月食是安全的。

sentences.english: Similarly, the eclipse will appear in Wangri that the Lunar New Year 15.
sentences.chinese: 同样地，月食一定出现在望日，即农历十五。

sentences.english: Two men sit on a bridge to watch an annular solar eclipse in Zhengzhou, Henan province, China.
sentences.chinese: 中国河南省郑州市，两人人坐在桥上观看月食。

sentences.english: Throughout history there are countless examples of when eclipses have foretold doom.
sentences.chinese: 纵观历史，月食预示灾难的事例不胜枚举。

sentences.english: A lunar eclipse occurs when the Earth's shadow falls on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 月食的发生，是由于地球的影子落在月球上。

sentences.english: The entire cast turned up on set for Eclipse looking super-buff.
sentences.chinese: 《月食》中亮相的全体演员现在个个超级健美。

sentences.english: If the air is very clear, the eclipse is bright.
sentences.chinese: 如果空气很清新，那么月食就会很明亮。

sentences.english: Do you still remember the ruthless Jane with kind of noble origin in The Twilight Saga: Eclipse?
sentences.chinese: 还记得《暮光之城3:月食》里面冷酷的简吗？

sentences.english: In neighbouring Bangladesh, eclipse watchers came out in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在邻近的孟加拉国，月食观察家出来趋之若鹜。

definition: an annular eclipse of the sun
aspect of the celestial bodies (used for navigation and astrology)
meteorological or astronomical phenomenon (e.g. rainbow or eclipse)
